7  fModifiers(128),

15  KSRootStepModifier::KSRootStepModifier(const KSRootStepModifier &aCopy) : KSComponent(),
16  fModifiers( aCopy.fModifiers ),
17  fModifier( aCopy.fModifier),
18  fInitialParticle( aCopy.fInitialParticle ),
19  fFinalParticle( aCopy.fFinalParticle ),
20  fParticleQueue( aCopy.fParticleQueue )

23  KSRootStepModifier* KSRootStepModifier::Clone() const
24  {
25  return new KSRootStepModifier( *this );

31  void KSRootStepModifier::AddModifier(KSStepModifier *aModifier)
32  {
33  fModifiers.AddElement( aModifier );
34  return;
35  }
36  void KSRootStepModifier::RemoveModifier(KSStepModifier *aModifier)
37  {
38  fModifiers.RemoveElement( aModifier );
39  return;
40  }
41  void KSRootStepModifier::SetStep( KSStep* aStep )
42  {
43  fStep = aStep;
44  fInitialParticle = &(aStep->InitialParticle());
45  fModifierParticle = &(aStep->TerminatorParticle());
46  fFinalParticle = &(aStep->FinalParticle());
47  fParticleQueue = &(aStep->ParticleQueue());
48 
49  return;
50  }
51 
52  void KSRootStepModifier::PushUpdateComponent()
53  {
54  for( int tIndex = 0; tIndex < fModifiers.End(); tIndex++ )
55  {
56  fModifiers.ElementAt( tIndex )->PushUpdate();
57  }
58  }
59 
60  void KSRootStepModifier::PushDeupdateComponent()
61  {
62  for( int tIndex = 0; tIndex < fModifiers.End(); tIndex++ )
63  {
64  fModifiers.ElementAt( tIndex )->PushDeupdate();
65  }
66  }
67 
68  bool KSRootStepModifier::ExecutePreStepModification()
69  {
70  //the following disables any change made to the initial particle, why?
71  *fModifierParticle = *fInitialParticle;
72  // fStep->ModifierName().clear();
73  //fStep->ModificationFlag() = false;
74 
75  if( fModifiers.End() == 0 )
76  {
77  modmsg_debug( "modifier calculation:" << eom )
78  modmsg_debug( " no modifier active" << eom )
79  //modmsg_debug( " modifier name: <" << fStep->GetModifierName() << ">" << eom )
80  //modmsg_debug( " modifier flag: <" << fStep->GetModificationFlag() << ">" << eom )
81 
82  modmsg_debug( "modifier calculation terminator particle state: " << eom )
83  modmsg_debug( " modifier particle space: <" << (fModifierParticle->GetCurrentSpace() ? fModifierParticle->GetCurrentSpace()->GetName() : "" ) << ">" << eom )
84  modmsg_debug( " modifier particle surface: <" << (fModifierParticle->GetCurrentSurface() ? fModifierParticle->GetCurrentSurface()->GetName() : "" ) << ">" << eom )
85  modmsg_debug( " modifier particle time: <" << fModifierParticle->GetTime() << ">" << eom )
86  modmsg_debug( " modifier particle length: <" << fModifierParticle->GetLength() << ">" << eom )
87  modmsg_debug( " modifier particle position: <" << fModifierParticle->GetPosition().X() << ", " << fModifierParticle->GetPosition().Y() << ", " << fModifierParticle->GetPosition().Z() << ">" << eom )
88  modmsg_debug( " modifier particle momentum: <" << fModifierParticle->GetMomentum().X() << ", " << fModifierParticle->GetMomentum().Y() << ", " << fModifierParticle->GetMomentum().Z() << ">" << eom )
89  modmsg_debug( " modifier particle kinetic energy: <" << fModifierParticle->GetKineticEnergy_eV() << ">" << eom )
90  modmsg_debug( " modifier particle electric field: <" << fModifierParticle->GetElectricField().X() << "," << fModifierParticle->GetElectricField().Y() << "," << fModifierParticle->GetElectricField().Z() << ">" << eom )
91  modmsg_debug( " modifier particle magnetic field: <" << fModifierParticle->GetMagneticField().X() << "," << fModifierParticle->GetMagneticField().Y() << "," << fModifierParticle->GetMagneticField().Z() << ">" << eom )
92  modmsg_debug( " modifier particle angle to magnetic field: <" << fModifierParticle->GetPolarAngleToB() << ">" << eom )
93 
94  return false; //changes to inital particle state disabled
95  }
96 
97  bool hasChangedState = ExecutePreStepModification( *fModifierParticle, *fParticleQueue );
98 
99  (void) hasChangedState;
100  //hasChangedState is unused because we are operating on the modifier particle
101  //this disables any changes to the intial particle
102

111 // modmsg_debug( " modification will not occur" << eom )

114  modmsg_debug( "modifier calculation modifier particle state: " << eom )
115  modmsg_debug( " modifier particle space: <" << (fModifierParticle->GetCurrentSpace() ? fModifierParticle->GetCurrentSpace()->GetName() : "" ) << ">" << eom )
116  modmsg_debug( " modifier particle surface: <" << (fModifierParticle->GetCurrentSurface() ? fModifierParticle->GetCurrentSurface()->GetName() : "" ) << ">" << eom )
117  modmsg_debug( " modifier particle time: <" << fModifierParticle->GetTime() << ">" << eom )
118  modmsg_debug( " modifier particle length: <" << fModifierParticle->GetLength() << ">" << eom )
119  modmsg_debug( " modifier particle position: <" << fModifierParticle->GetPosition().X() << ", " << fModifierParticle->GetPosition().Y() << ", " << fModifierParticle->GetPosition().Z() << ">" << eom )
120  modmsg_debug( " modifier particle momentum: <" << fModifierParticle->GetMomentum().X() << ", " << fModifierParticle->GetMomentum().Y() << ", " << fModifierParticle->GetMomentum().Z() << ">" << eom )
121  modmsg_debug( " modifier particle kinetic energy: <" << fModifierParticle->GetKineticEnergy_eV() << ">" << eom )
122  modmsg_debug( " modifier particle electric field: <" << fModifierParticle->GetElectricField().X() << "," << fModifierParticle->GetElectricField().Y() << "," << fModifierParticle->GetElectricField().Z() << ">" << eom )
123  modmsg_debug( " modifier particle magnetic field: <" << fModifierParticle->GetMagneticField().X() << "," << fModifierParticle->GetMagneticField().Y() << "," << fModifierParticle->GetMagneticField().Z() << ">" << eom )
124  modmsg_debug( " modifier particle angle to magnetic field: <" << fModifierParticle->GetPolarAngleToB() << ">" << eom )
125 
126  return false; //changes to initial particle state disabled
127  }

129  bool KSRootStepModifier::ExecutePostStepModifcation()
130  {
131  bool hasChangedState = ExecutePostStepModifcation( *fModifierParticle, *fFinalParticle, *fParticleQueue );
132  //fFinalParticle->ReleaseLabel( fStep->ModifierName() );
133 
134  modmsg_debug( "terminator execution:" << eom )
135  modmsg_debug( " terminator name: <" << fStep->TerminatorName() << ">" << eom )
136  modmsg_debug( " step continuous time: <" << fStep->ContinuousTime() << ">" << eom )
137  modmsg_debug( " step continuous length: <" << fStep->ContinuousLength() << ">" << eom )
138  modmsg_debug( " step continuous energy change: <" << fStep->ContinuousEnergyChange() << ">" << eom )
139  modmsg_debug( " step continuous momentum change: <" << fStep->ContinuousMomentumChange() << ">" << eom )
140  modmsg_debug( " step discrete secondaries: <" << fStep->DiscreteSecondaries() << ">" << eom )
141  modmsg_debug( " step discrete energy change: <" << fStep->DiscreteEnergyChange() << ">" << eom )
142  modmsg_debug( " step discrete momentum change: <" << fStep->DiscreteMomentumChange() << ">" << eom )
143 
144  modmsg_debug( "terminator final particle state: " << eom )
145  modmsg_debug( " final particle space: <" << (fModifierParticle->GetCurrentSpace() ? fModifierParticle->GetCurrentSpace()->GetName() : "" ) << ">" << eom )
146  modmsg_debug( " final particle surface: <" << (fModifierParticle->GetCurrentSurface() ? fModifierParticle->GetCurrentSurface()->GetName() : "" ) << ">" << eom )
147  modmsg_debug( " final particle time: <" << fModifierParticle->GetTime() << ">" << eom )
148  modmsg_debug( " final particle length: <" << fModifierParticle->GetLength() << ">" << eom )
149  modmsg_debug( " final particle position: <" << fModifierParticle->GetPosition().X() << ", " << fModifierParticle->GetPosition().Y() << ", " << fModifierParticle->GetPosition().Z() << ">" << eom )
150  modmsg_debug( " final particle momentum: <" << fModifierParticle->GetMomentum().X() << ", " << fModifierParticle->GetMomentum().Y() << ", " << fModifierParticle->GetMomentum().Z() << ">" << eom )
151  modmsg_debug( " final particle kinetic energy: <" << fModifierParticle->GetKineticEnergy_eV() << ">" << eom )
152  modmsg_debug( " final particle electric field: <" << fModifierParticle->GetElectricField().X() << "," << fModifierParticle->GetElectricField().Y() << "," << fModifierParticle->GetElectricField().Z() << ">" << eom )
153  modmsg_debug( " final particle magnetic field: <" << fModifierParticle->GetMagneticField().X() << "," << fModifierParticle->GetMagneticField().Y() << "," << fModifierParticle->GetMagneticField().Z() << ">" << eom )
154  modmsg_debug( " final particle angle to magnetic field: <" << fModifierParticle->GetPolarAngleToB() << ">" << eom )
155 
156  return hasChangedState;
157  }
158 
159  bool KSRootStepModifier::ExecutePreStepModification( KSParticle& anInitialParticle,
160  KSParticleQueue& aParticleQueue )
161  {
162  bool hasChangedState = false;
163  for( int tIndex = 0; tIndex < fModifiers.End(); tIndex++ )
164  {
165  bool changed = fModifiers.ElementAt( tIndex )->ExecutePreStepModification( anInitialParticle, aParticleQueue );
166  if(changed){hasChangedState = true;};
167  }
168 
169  return hasChangedState;
170  }
171 
172  bool KSRootStepModifier::ExecutePostStepModifcation( KSParticle& anInitialParticle,
173  KSParticle& aFinalParticle,
174  KSParticleQueue& aParticleQueue )
175  {
176  bool hasChangedState = false;
177  for( int tIndex = 0; tIndex < fModifiers.End(); tIndex++ )
178  {
179  bool changed = fModifiers.ElementAt( tIndex )->ExecutePostStepModifcation( anInitialParticle,
180  aFinalParticle,
181  aParticleQueue );
182  if(changed){hasChangedState = true;};
183  }
184 
185  return hasChangedState;
186  }

191  &KSRootStepModifier::RemoveModifier,
192  "add_modifier",
193  "remove_modifier" );
